title: Duke Nukem for Game Boy Color
brief_description: Duke Nukem’s world-saving exploits have attracted the attention of a new alien foe, the Zorgonites. They plan kidnap the smartest minds in the universe - including Duke’s - to power their hyper-intelligent war machine and conquer the universe. The game takes the player around the world and beyond to stop this from happening. A Game Boy Colour port of Duke Nukem II, much as been changed. For instance, the Zorgonites were originally called the Rigelatins. The levels, weapons, items, enemies, and bosses are almost completely different.
